sentences.en: Affected by three major banks today Dikaigaozou index led the rebound.
sentences.cn: 受此影响今日三大银行低开高走带领指数反弹.

sentences.en: Affected, Zhengzhou is expected today or PTA futures will continue to rebound.
sentences.cn: 受其影响, 预计郑州PTA期货今日或将继续反弹.

sentences.en: Assume that the molecules stick to the plate rather than rebound.
sentences.cn: 假设分子与板碰掸后粘附在板面上,而不是反跳开.

sentences.en: Bad deeds , as well as good, may rebound upon the doer.
sentences.cn: 善有善报, 恶有恶报.

sentences.en: Does laser treat an operation to you can rebound?
sentences.cn: 激光治疗手术会反弹 吗 ?

sentences.en: I caught the ball on the rebound.
I tried to sneak in for the offensive rebound.
If we get a second - half rebound, all the better.
sentences.cn: 如果今年下半年出现反弹, 形势就会好得多.

sentences.en: Our evil example will rebound upon ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们的坏榜样会回到我们自己头上的〔意为结果自己受害〕.

sentences.en: Share prices rebounded today after last week’s losses.
sentences.cn: 股票价格在上周下跌之后，今天出现了反弹。

sentences.en: She quarrelled with Paul and then married Peter on the rebound.
sentences.cn: 她和保罗争吵后愤而嫁给了彼得.

sentences.en: The crowd watched intently as the ball player score rebound.
sentences.cn: 观众们聚精会神地看着这个球员抢下篮板球.

sentences.en: The magnitude of the rebound inversely related to ribavirin concentrations.
sentences.cn: 反跳的程度与利巴韦林浓度呈负相关.

sentences.en: The recent rebound in mortgage rates could snuff out the housing recovery.
sentences.cn: 抵押贷款利率最近的回升可能会扼杀房地产的复苏。

sentences.en: The theory is generally called the elastic rebound theory.
sentences.cn: 这次理论我们一般称之为弹性回跳理论.

sentences.en: Unit volume can be full today and a new high rebound holding.
sentences.cn: 该股今日量能充沛,再创反弹新高,持有.

sentences.en: When fat stores drop, the hormone is shut off causing appetite to rebound.
sentences.cn: 当脂肪蓄积减少, 这种激素就停止分泌,引起食欲反弹.

phrases.tran_cn: 得到意想不到的影响；使得到报应

trans.tran_cn: 弹回，跳回，反弹球，篮板球，振作，反应
trans.tran_en: an act of catching a  basketball  after a player has tried but failed to get a point
if a ball or other moving object rebounds, it moves quickly back away from something it has just hit

trans.tran_cn: 弹回，从诸如衰败或失望中恢复过来，回荡，回响，抢得篮板球
